description:
Prepare for the excitement and joy of taking part in one of the greatest motor sports events!

GAME FEATURES:
▶ IMPRESSIVE CAR COLLECTION : Drive 10 Awesome Cars
▶ PRO DRIVING MISSIONS: Huge campaign to beat, earn in-game money for your progress
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion

In the game you will get the chance to drive around the festival grounds and beyond, exploring the whole sunny area where this amazing event is taking place in.

Drive around varied, demanding courses. Explore the festival grounds, the neighboring area, avoid obstacles and try to reach the goal as fast as possible!
name: Super Car Driver
